eu_initiatives: EU Energy Union, with a focus on those policies / initiatives that impact on the domestic / residential sector -in terms of Directives this primarily concerns Energy Efficiency Directive, Renewables Directive, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Labeling and Ecodesign Directive

EST is also an implementing body delivering UK programmes related to the UK Government's implementation of the Energy Efficiency Directive, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive and Renewables Directive
goals__remit: We are a leading and trusted organisation helping people save energy every day. Our experts speak with millions of householders every year, deliver first class programmes for governments and provide consultancy to UK businesses and international companies. All that we do is underpinned by our pioneering world-renowned research.  We are independent and impartial so the advice we give is all about helping consumers
